text: Yeah - so you need to supply a unix timestamp in milliseconds

Hey Guys, we are new to HubSpot. We need to create a custom object and the only way to do that is through the API. We don't have any devs, Can anyone here help us to make that call from HubSpot team? We have the fields already designed.

hey all. i’m getting ready to build a custom object for my client’s projects, and i realized that it has repeatable data in it (you can add multiple instances of different types of pipe to the project). so my JSON object will contain sub-objects. what’s the best way to go about this? HubDB for each pipe instance, and relate it back? Second custom object? Save the pipe object as a text JSON field? (is there any way for a sales rep to make sense of that if they need to?)

happy to share my demo page privately with anyone who has thoughts on this.
Hey Melinda - can you outline the objects you currently have? If it's sensitive info, feel free to DM
Using multiple custom objects + associations is always a good shout - as long as you don't think you're going to exceed 10k associations to a single object.
it’s a calculator, soooooooooooo maybe for the individual pipes
i’ll send you a link shortly.

Hi everyone,

Was interested in seeing if there are any agencies or freelancers who have experience connecting HubSpot with Delltek Maconomy (ERP) and/or Introhive (Relationship Management Tool). My firm is evaluating HubSpot as a potential marketing automation tool and I was hoping someone on this slack channel might have experience doing this.

Feel free to DM me directly. Thank you in advance!
